body_html:
Nagging Assignee @caisq: It has been 59 days with no activity and this issue has an assignee. Please update the label and/or status accordingly.

In the meantime this behavior was introduced in c98ffff.

This is now my second PR (after #20753) that went obsolete during the time it took to get a review. Are there any discussions (GH issues) going on around improving the management of contributions from outside Google? I'd be happy to join the conversation.

body:
> Nagging Assignee @caisq: It has been 59 days with no activity and this issue has an assignee. Please update the label and/or status accordingly.

In the meantime this behavior was introduced in c98ffffcb4e0cc668c0ff7b73d51677a7eb7dcf4.

This is now my second PR (after #20753) that went obsolete during the time it took to get a review. Are there any discussions (GH issues) going on around improving the management of contributions from outside Google? I'd be happy to join the conversation.
